name: Disqus Count JS Fix
author: Avishay Bassa, Geektime

sections.description:
This plugin fixes the ‘split’ error caused by Disqus Plugin. This Plugin was developed by Geektime’s dev team for internal purposes only, and was shared for your convenience. We do not provide any support services for this plugin.

Usage

  1. Install the plugin.
  2. Enjoy!
sections.installation:
1. Upload disqus-count-js-fix.zip onto your local computer.
  2. Go to your WordPress Dashboard and select Plugins >> Add New.
  3. Click on the Upload option at the top and select the disqus-count-js-fix.zip you just downloaded.
  4. Click on Install.
  5. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  6. Thatâ€™s It!
sections.faq:
Why do I need this plugin

This plugin fixes the ‘split’ error caused by Disqus Plugin, which causes headaches and pain while using the great Disqus Comments plugin.

Credits

The fix was presented by Rick Mac gillis from the wordpress.org support forums, at the following link:
https://wordpress.org/support/topic/fix-nodesiparentnodehref-is-undefined

All I did was to take his code and turn it into a plugin the overwrites default Disqus plugin functionality, so all credits belong to Rick. Thanks, Rick!
